author: Staff Reporter
text:
The first postal Automated Teller Machine (ATM) in Tiruvannamalai district has been inaugurated recently in the Arani Head Post office.

L. Chandrasekar, Superintendent of Posts, Tiruvannamalai, told The Hindu that the ATM is the fourth in Chennai City Region of postal department and 444th in the nation.

As of now only postal ATMs given anywhere can be used in the ATM. Just like any ATM this too offers the customer the convenience of multiple locations.

They can withdraw cash at any bank that is part of the system to which their ATM card is linked. Only select post offices issue the ATM cards now.

Mervin Alexander, Post Master General, Chennai City Region inaugurated the ATM.

Second ATM

Soon, the second postal ATM of the district would be inaugurated in the Tiruvannamalai Head Post Office. The arrangements are nearing completion, he said.
title: First postal ATM of Tiruvannamalai district inaugurated atArani
